name: kinto
description: Kinto is a lightweight JSON storage service for syncing data across devices. It supports collections, permissions and versioning, and exposes a REST API and simple admin UI, often used for small self hosted sync or configuration backends.
features: JSON Storage: Store and retrieve JSON documents via RESTful API. Lightweight data backend for applications.
Collection Management: Organize data into collections with schemas and validation. Structure your data logically.
Sync Service: Synchronize data across devices with conflict resolution. Keep data consistent everywhere.
Offline Support: Client libraries with offline-first capabilities. Work without internet connection.
User Authentication: Built-in authentication with accounts and sessions. Secure access to data.
Permissions: Fine-grained access control at collection and record level. Control who sees what.
Versioning: Automatic change history with rollback capabilities. Track data modifications over time.
Sharing: Share collections and records with other users. Collaborate on data.
Admin UI: Web interface for browsing and managing data. Visualize stored information.
Attachments: Store files alongside JSON records. Keep related data together.
Real-Time: WebSocket support for live data updates. Build reactive applications.
Client Libraries: Official SDKs for JavaScript, Python, and other languages. Easy integration with apps.
